languages.text: Обезвреженное взрывное устройство, сотворенное руками нелюдей и доставленное на борт корабля фон Валанциус ксеносами-рейдерами.
A defused explosive device created by inhuman hands and brought aboard the von Valancius ship by xenos raiders.
languages.original_text: Обезвреженное взрывное устройство, сотворенное руками нелюдей и доставленное на борт корабля фон Валанциус ксеносами-рейдерами.

traits.locale_text: A defused explosive device created by inhuman hands and brought aboard the von Valancius ship by xenos raiders.

languages.text: 由异形制造的引爆装置，被异形袭击者带到了冯·瓦兰修斯家族的舰船上。
languages.original_text: A defused explosive device created by inhuman hands and brought aboard the von Valancius ship by xenos raiders.

traits.locale_text: 由异形制造的引爆装置，被异形袭击者带到了冯·瓦兰修斯家族的舰船上。

languages.text: Un explosivo desactivado, fabricado por manos inhumanas y traído a bordo de la nave von Valancius por incursores xenos.
languages.original_text: A defused explosive device created by inhuman hands and brought aboard the von Valancius ship by xenos raiders.

traits.locale_text: Un explosivo desactivado, fabricado por manos inhumanas y traído a bordo de la nave von Valancius por incursores xenos.

languages.text: 亜人の手によって作られ、異種族のレイダーによってフォン・ヴァランシウスの船に持ち込まれた装置。信管は抜かれている。
languages.original_text: A defused explosive device created by inhuman hands and brought aboard the von Valancius ship by xenos raiders.

traits.locale_text: 亜人の手によって作られ、異種族のレイダーによってフォン・ヴァランシウスの船に持ち込まれた装置。信管は抜かれている。

languages.text: Un explosif désamorcé d'origine non-humaine, apporté sur le vaisseau von Valancius par des pillards xénos.
languages.original_text: A defused explosive device created by inhuman hands and brought aboard the von Valancius ship by xenos raiders.

traits.locale_text: Un explosif désamorcé d'origine inhumaine, apporté sur le vaisseau von Valancius par des pillards xénos.

languages.text: Ein entschärfter Sprengsatz, der von unmenschlichen Händen erschaffen und von Xenos-Räubern an Bord des Valancius-Schiffs gebracht wurde.
languages.original_text: A defused explosive device created by inhuman hands and brought aboard the von Valancius ship by xenos raiders.

traits.locale_text: Ein entschärfter Sprengsatz, der von unmenschlichen Händen erschaffen und von Xenos-Räubern an Bord des Valancius-Schiffs gebracht wurde.

languages.text: İnsan dışı ellerden çıkma olup baskıncı zenolar tarafından von Valancius gemisine konulan, etkisiz hâle getirilmiş bir patlayıcı cihaz.
languages.original_text: A defused explosive device created by inhuman hands and brought aboard the von Valancius ship by xenos raiders.

traits.locale_text: İnsan dışı eller tarafından yaratılan ve von Valancius gemisine zeno baskıncılar tarafından konulan, etkisiz hâle getirilmiş bir patlayıcı aygıt.
